item.title: TCP Congestion Control: I
item.description: It’s been a while since I picked up the proverbial pen to jot down my ramblings. The usual trappings of work and life have encumbered me. But then again, the curious mind just needs to take a liking to something for the muse to strike. So here I am; digging into TCP congestion control mechanisms & the underlying algorithms. ‘cause, heck; why not! Networks are fascinating things; Links and network elements working together to ferry bytes from point A to point B.
